The Tower has awoken!


Fight through an ever changing, randomly-generated Tower! Face many challenges in your quest to defeat the Dragon and conquer the Tower!

Create your own character, buy weapons and spells, fight evil monsters, discover secrets! Challenge the Tower in this Roguelike RPG!

Please rate and comment! Thanks! :)
